definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: Also eat some fruits, milk and a small amount of soft drinks containing carbonic acid gas.
sentences.chinese: 还可吃一些水果，牛奶以及少量含碳酸气的饮料。

sentences.english: The double bond is attacked by the oxygen, forming aldehydes and carbonyls.
sentences.chinese: 双结合受氧的攻击形成乙醛和碳酸基。

sentences.english: Coumarin has been synthesized in Perkinreaction of acetic anhydride and salicylaldehydecatalyzed by anhydrous potassium carbonate.
sentences.chinese: 用无水碳酸钾代替无水醋酸钠催化合成了香豆素。

sentences.english: Once in the water, it reacts to form carbonic acid.
sentences.chinese: 二氧化碳一旦进入水中，就会发生反应形成碳酸。

sentences.english: So that a new way to produce high-purity manganese carbonate is opened up.
sentences.chinese: 从而为高纯度碳酸锰的制备开辟了一条新的途径。

sentences.english: The price of potash has already started to recover from declines sparked by the Great Recession.
sentences.chinese: 碳酸钾价格已经从大萧条造成的下跌中回升了。

sentences.english: Conclusions Thrush was well prevented with 2% sodium bicarbonate.
sentences.chinese: 结论2%碳酸氢钠清洗口腔可预防鹅口疮。

sentences.english: Barium carbonate was prepared by using common precipitation method.
sentences.chinese: 采用共沉淀法合成了碳酸钡粒子。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of prevention of thrush by oral nursing with 2%sodium bicarbonate.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察2%碳酸氢钠清洗口腔预防鹅口疮的效果。

sentences.english: The paper introduces the progress in synthesis technology and the developing trend of dimethyl - carbonate.
sentences.chinese: 本文叙述了碳酸二甲酯合成技术进展情况及发展趋势。

sentences.english: The ore was heated in the kilns to drive off water and carbonic acid gas.
sentences.chinese: 矿石被放入窑里加热，蒸发掉水和碳酸气。

sentences.english: Many species of invertebrate have shells or skeletons made of calcium carbonate.
sentences.chinese: 无脊椎类的好多物种有碳酸钙质的外壳或骨骼。

sentences.english: They have rejected a tax on sodas and sugary drinks.
sentences.chinese: 他们否决了针对碳酸饮料的一项税收。

sentences.english: Mechanism of carbon reducing reaction in preparing strontium carbonate by carbon reducing method was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了碳还原法制备碳酸锶过程中碳还原反应的机理。

sentences.english: There are two kinds of reserviors consisting of clastics and carbonates in Yakela Black.
sentences.chinese: 雅克拉断凸储层主要有碎屑岩和碳酸盐岩两大类。

sentences.english: Tea, coffee, juice, even soda count (though it’s also smart to avoid empty calories) toward your total.
sentences.chinese: 茶，咖啡，水果汁，甚至碳酸水都算进你的总量。
